RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 80. Allowance Purse 21200. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 15 Allowed 3 lbs. (Maiden Or Claiming Races For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DATTTSAFANCYFOX gained on the turn bidding from mid track down the lane rallying clear in the closing yards. LIGHTNIN RUNNER bid clear at the quarter pole widening in upper stretch digging in ceding late to outside pressure. CASTLE REVIEW chased the pace bidding willingly late. FIRST IMPRESSION slow early raced very wide into upper stretch moving up late. HOV LANE pressed the pace to upper stretch weakening there. GET A GRIP MARILYN faded on the turn. ELARY pressed the pace through the turn wilting in upper stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Hov Lane
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Elary
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, spent

ENTRY.NAME: First Impression
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, lagged turn, wide into lane, moved up

ENTRY.NAME: Datttsafancyfox
ENTRY.COMMENT: gained on turn, bid mid track lane, rallied clear

ENTRY.NAME: Lightnin Runner
ENTRY.COMMENT: bid clear 1/4 pol4, widened top lane, run down inside late

ENTRY.NAME: Get a Grip Marilyn
ENTRY.COMMENT: faded on the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Castle Review
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, bid willingly late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 2 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 71. Claiming Purse 7800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 15 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BORN HAPPY pressed the pace dueling abreast rival down the lane matching strides getting up on the wire. OMEGA GOLD pressed the pace dueling inside of rival down the lane matching strides missing on the wire. RESVALON tracked the pace to upper stretch bidding near mid track there lacking punch at the end. BLACK BULL raced evenly throughout posing no menace. CIRCLE INDY chased from the inside to upper stretch tiring there. WICKED REVIEW was always a step slow angling to the rail in upper stretch. A B G GUERRERO was always outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Circle Indy
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, tired,

ENTRY.NAME: Omega Gold
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dueled inside of foe lane, just missed,

ENTRY.NAME: Black Bull
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, no menace

ENTRY.NAME: A B G Guerrero
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Resvalon
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace, mid track lane, lacked punch

ENTRY.NAME: Born Happy
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dueled abreast lane, in tandem, up wire

ENTRY.NAME: Wicked Review
ENTRY.COMMENT: always a step slow

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 70. Claiming Purse 8300. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE NOVEMBER 15, 2022 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since October 15 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ALICIA'S WAY advanced to lead on the backside digging in to upper stretch dueling on the inside of rival prevailing gamely. IRON BERTIE unhurried early pressed up quickly to hook foe on the far turn dueling abreast rival down the lane missing on the wire. MYRA FLEENER raced evenly throughout holding position. MALIBU MARLEE bobbled at the break rushing hard to contention on the backside flattening out on the far turn. MANHATTAN LADY was never involved. SUSIKIN was eased in mid stretch walking off after the race.

ENTRY.NAME: Susikin
ENTRY.COMMENT: eased mid stretch, walked off

ENTRY.NAME: Alicia's Way
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, led to lane, dug in late, up gamely,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Sequel, NY & Barone's Sunny Crest Farm

ENTRY.NAME: Manhattan Lady
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Malibu Marlee
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled break, rushed to contention, flattened out,

ENTRY.NAME: Myra Fleener
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, held spot

ENTRY.NAME: Iron Bertie
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, pressed up far turn, dueled abreast lane, missed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 65. Claiming Purse 7900. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 15 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BIG AMBITION chased the pace pressing into upper stretch taking a late lead holding under outside pressure. SURCHARGE rallied on the turn vying near mid track down the lane bidding gamely in the final yards. MY PINK BABY BIRD slow early lost ground to upper stretch moving up late six wide. BOUJEE KITTEN a step slow through the turn played no factor. GOLD PASS pressed to a short lead on the turn weakening late along the inside. SECRET SEDUCTION pressed on the inside to upper stretch fading late. MAYSVILLE MISS off slowly was always outrun. TEXAS DANA was pulled up, bled, was walked off.

ENTRY.NAME: Maysville Miss
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slowly, outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: My Pink Baby Bird
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, lost ground to lane, moved up 6 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Secret Seduction
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed inside to lane, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Surcharge
ENTRY.OWNER: CM Racing and Jones Jr Michael E
ENTRY.COMMENT: rallied on the turn bid mid track lane, pressed last yards

ENTRY.NAME: Big Ambition
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, dueled lane, led late, held to pressure

ENTRY.NAME: Texas Dana
ENTRY.COMMENT: pulled up bled, walked off

ENTRY.NAME: Boujee Kitten
ENTRY.COMMENT: step slow, no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Gold Pass
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, led to lane, weakened inside

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 86. Claiming Purse 12100. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE MAY 15, 2023. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500 (Claiming Races For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In ELIGIBILITY)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility) .
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CAMP PENDLETON went evenly to upper stretch firing late in the four path surging up between horses. HIATUS stalked the pace pressing on the far turn wresting the lead in upper stretch being grabbed late from the outside. MONEY FOR MISCHIEF went evenly rallying on the far turn racing mid track down the lane surging late three deep. HARD ASTRAY set the pace being hooked on the far turn weakening along the inside mid stretch. TEXTPECTATION played no factor. LOKOYA ROAD stalked the pace tiring in upper stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Hard Astray
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, hooked far turn, weakened inside

ENTRY.NAME: Textpectation
ENTRY.COMMENT: played no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Lokoya Road
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, tired lane

ENTRY.NAME: Hiatus
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, pressed to lane, led inside, grabbed late

ENTRY.NAME: Camp Pendleton
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly to lane, surged late four path, up between horses

ENTRY.NAME: Money for Mischief
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, rallied far turn, mid track lane, surged late three deep

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 96. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 18800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $12,500. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 15 Allowed 3 lbs . Claiming Price $12,500 (Claiming Races For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: OUT OF CENTS pressed up on the turn wresting the lead abreast rival in upper stretch digging in gamely late. KOZY'S WILDCAT pressed the pace dueling through the turn then down the lane being out gamed late. MUNI MUNI SLEW slow early raced four wide down the lane responding to finish well. TWO BIT KID pressed on the turn then weakened the final eighth. MASAI MAN pressed early then faded along the inside to upper stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Masai Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Two Bit Kid
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed on the turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Muni Muni Slew
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, 4 wide into lane, finished well

ENTRY.NAME: Out of Cents
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed up on turn, led abreast lane, dug in gamely,

ENTRY.NAME: Kozy's Wildcat
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dueled on turn, extended lane, out gamed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 7 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 92. Allowance Purse 23800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 15 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claiming Races For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ICING clung to a narrow lead through the turn shaking clear in upper stretch drawing out as much the best. BANKX TURBO saved ground rallying down the lane getting up on the wire for place. DEACON DOUGIE pressured abreast rival through the turn dispatched by the winner in upper stretch would battle for place to the wire. CALL ME LATER raced evenly lacking more. SHELTOWEE'S BALI played no factor. CHOCO ROCO was always outrun.

ENTRY.COMMENT: clung to narrow lead, shook clear upper stretch, much best

ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 8 1M Dirt CR: 79. Claiming Purse 8300. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE NOVEMBER 15, 2022 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since October 15 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,0 00 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CANDY CRUSHEM surged into upper stretch rallying up late four wide. MR HOOVER pressed on the turn dueling down the lane being out gamed late. BRODYTHEOXMAN pressed from the rail on the turn dueling down the lane coming up a touch short. PARADE GRAND advanced to the half pressing on the far turn weakening in upper stretch. REDOUTE'S LIGHT stalked the pace pressing on the far turn tiring in upper stretch. RY'S REVENGE set the pace ceding on the far turn giving way in upper stretch.

ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed inside on the turn, dueled lane, bit short

ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, pressed far turn, weakened,
